Comments
February 24, 2021
Jarosa
Full dial telekinesis and sidestep both for 20 points. Yes incredibly useful. Topdial TK is the first power I check for in sealed. He just needs to survive long enough to get your Alpha Strike off and with 4 clicks of life it is very doable.
February 20, 2021
KillerKing
Another 20 points sidekick, this time with sidestep and telekinesis. He is really good.
February 11, 2021
Goop
Tk and sidestep is great for 20pts. Wish he had a little bit more for def though. Position him carefully, consider various captains to protect him.
